attributes.action: Stop the 3rd runway and the destruction of Cherry Lane Cemetry
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: I believe that the building of the 3rd runway is extremely unfair for the people that live around the proposed runway. also, the destruction of cherry lane cemetry is cruel to the people that their relatives have recently died and have bought plots to be buried next to ther loved ones. i am a teenager but feel extremely strongly about the expansion of LHR. i live close to the runway and my life, my friends, my helth and wellbeing will be effected if the runway goes ahea PLEASE DO NOT EXPAND HEATHROW.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
